body: HI!! My Lab always use ladybug. We want to use "Import ground temp",but there is something wrong with it. It say "1. Solution exception:unsupported operand type(s) for -: 'tuple' and 'float'" Could you give me your advice Best Regard. Hiro

replies.body:
Hi Hiro,

Please reinsert the component. The one in the image corresponds to a previous version. You probably updated using the updater component. This is one of those cases that this should be done manually since the amount of input/output items changed.

-A.

Saying that i've found a bug:

When i set the visualisedata_Month FIRST to true i get the following error:

1. Solution exception:name 'drawLegend' is not defined

Then i set the visualisedata_Season to true (and the previous to false). It works. Then i set again the Month to true and now it works.

Small bug ...

-A.

Hi Abraham.

I reinsert this component from [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/tree/master/userObjects](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/tree/master/userObjects).

but this version is ver 0.058. 

is this component is wrong?



Best Regard. Hiro

It is indeed 0.58. You should see 3 input items: epwfile, visualisedata_Season and visualisedata_Month

-A.

Hi Hiro



Can you email me your file to ajszilasi@gmail.com I'll have a look and get it fixed ASAP for you
Sorry for not seeing your question earlier!

Hi Anton,

You can follow my description above to dsee the problem sequence.

Thanks,

-A.

Hi Abraham,Anton



thank you for your kindness.



I can work Groundtemp because my epw  have no ground temperature data.



Sorry for late replay.

Hi Hiro



Thats interesting I thought all epw files have ground temperature data can you tell me what location your epw file is and I'll take a look if some epw files dont have a location I need to build a check in that detects this
